item.title: Barriers left blocking parking, 15th September
item.description:
The drain outside 28 barriered off to prevent parking, for repair access. Repaired but barriers not taken away. Still affecting parking on the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Dorset Avenue, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Resurfacing Required, 15th September
item.description:
Whilst the badly damaged path leading from Bassett Close to Gretton Road has now been resurfaced by council workmen, so thank you for that, another issue remains unresolved. The public footpath at the bottom side of No. 15 Huddleston Road is in a similarly poor condition. This path links the footpath between Nos. 1–15 Huddleston Road and Elderfield Close. A resident previously raised this with Gloucestershire County Council some time ago, but no action has yet been taken. I trust this path will be considered for inclusion in the next local resurfacing project for Winchcombe without further delay.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Huddleston Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
